notes: Can only trigger when an attack lands on an enemy. This means it cannot trigger on missed attacks.
Only triggers against enemy heroes (including illusions and clones, excluding creep-heroes).
Does not trigger if the attacking unit is a clone or illusion.
abilities.description: The next attack silences the hit enemy for 1.5 seconds.

info: The attack damage bonus is magical. It works with lifesteal, but not with crit or cleave.
